modName: Argonian Retexture - Mix of Drachis Argonian and JazzJR Argonian Retexture
summary: Mix of the reptillian pattern used by JazzJR and the chest/face patterns by Drachis for argonians.
descriptionHtml:
I've received a few requests to share a retexture I made for some of my characters. Essentially, what I did was splice together the textures from two other mods - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/981]Drachis Argonians[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7712]JazzJr Argonian Retextures[/url]. I checked with both authors and confirmed that it was all right to share this retexture, so here it goes.

Fair warning - I primarily set this up with the character I was using at the time, which was an argonian male. I set up a female retexture as well, but I don't have any guarantee that it'll work. I wasn't using anything fantastic to set this up outside of some of the basic instructions given on the forums to set these textures up, and I'm not operating with any sort of experience with the associated tools either. That said, there seemed to be enough interest in getting something like this out there, so perhaps another modder might see this and touch up the loose ends. Or, just do what I did and splice the textures from their respective mods, only with some more care and attention to the details. Probably fix the maps, too.
author: naengwen
